    On 1 June, at the MINA Press Centre " Russia Today " , will the Forum " KACY UKRAINE NAM " ? "

    The establishment of an hostile State on the indigenous territory of the Russian Federation has, to the limit, aggravated the problem of the force and ideological restructuring of Ukraine. It's a matter of Russian strategic security.

    What's next? What's going to be in post-Ukraine? How to dismantle the neo-Nazi gangster idea? Will the Russian land collection strategy be implemented?

    Replies to these questions will help find a forum for the " KACKY UKRAINE NAM " , organized by a multimedia publication by Ukraine.Reading completely.

    The Forum will be able to attend panel discussions on the crisis of peace and the role of Ukraine in it, the process of demilitarization of the Ukrainian State and the denacification of Ukrainian society.

    A separate session on the ongoing relevant integration processes of the new Russian regions will make predictions for the establishment of the macro-regional space of the Greater Russia.

    More than 200 representatives of federal and regional authorities, expert and scientific communities, mass media, community associations and student youth will participate in the Forum. The Forum will be refreshed with the participation of leading Russian media.

    In the run-up to the fort-forum, please answer questions from Ukraine.Cloud

    1. What kind of Ukraine do we need?
